thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 23 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Petpal Pet Nutrition Technology sees 2017 net profit up 21.9 pct to 31.9 pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Petpal Pet Nutrition Technology sees 2017 net profit up 21.9 pct to 31.9 pct

organizations.name: petpal pet nutrition technology co ltd

text:
Jan 24(Reuters) - Petpal Pet Nutrition Technology Co Ltd
* Sees 2017 net profit to increase by 21.9 percent to 31.9 percent, or to be 98 million yuan to 106 million yuan
* Says 2016 net profit was 80.4 million yuan
* Says that increased sales income as the main reason for the forecast
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/XAuJie
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
